snippet.title: Streak: Hoverboard Racing - PS1 (1998)
snippet.description: From developer SingleTrac. It's no Jet Moto, but it's still pretty fun! A stylish hoverboard racer with short, nicely detailed courses. Control is very precise, it's easy to oversteer into walls. The full aerial controls are pretty impressive, though it'd take a few hours to get really used to them. Like Jet Moto, Streak is at its most fun when sliding up walls at high speeds and catching big air, and pulling off tricks and flips to increase your confidence meter and go faster.
